lead_paragraph: For all the talk of banned performance-enhancing drugs in sport, mundane over-the-counter anti-inflammatory pain medications may be more of an issue on the tennis tour, according to numerous players.

headline.print_headline: Players May Be Risking Health by Popping Pain Pills
headline.main: Players May Be Risking Health by Popping Pain Pills
